刘杨

PhD in Control Science and Engineering, Algorithm Engineer, and Product-oriented developer

gloolar@gmail.com | herrkaefer | herrkaefer

技能方向

  • 生物医学信号处理
  • 机器学习
  • 演化计算
  • C/C++ & 算法设计与实现
  • Python/Matlab & 数据分析
  • Swift & iOS/watchOS 开发
  • 基于 Arduino 的嵌入式系统原型开发
  • 基于 Python 的 Web Application

研发项目

2017- 儿童智能杯托: 游戏化儿童饮水激励装置. (基于 Arduino 的原型系统)

运动检测算法的嵌入式实现. (implemented with C)

macOS App “Mole” (鼹鼠): Markdown文档管理工具. (built with Electron)

iOS App “算房大师”. Script part open sourced:

2016 psycopgr: 真实地图上的多点间最短路径计算 Python 库 (基于 PostgreSQL 和 pgRouting). Open source:

可穿戴设备上的运动检测算法. (implemented with C, Python, and Swift)

iOS & watchOS App “MotionScope”: 使用iWatch记录和识别任何胳膊参与的身体运动.

libcube: 演化计算框架 (written in C) Open source:

Elastic vehicle routing algorithm engine (written in C).

2015 iOS App “眼科行医手记 (Case Assistant)“. Open source:

Travelling trip planner (web application). Open source:

2014-15 物流路径优化算法库 (Vehicle routing library for logistics) (built with C)

2008-10 脑机接口 (Brain-computer interface) 原型系统: (built with C++/Qt and Python)

  • 视线独立字符拼写器 (Gaze-independent speller)
  • 基于 cube 编码的事件相关电位拼写器 (Cube encoded ERP speller)
  • P300 事件相关电位机械器控制器 (P300 ERP based mechanical arm controller)
  • 运动想象游戏 (Game played with motion imagery)

2005-07 EEG 信号处理与分类工具集 (written in Matlab)

2004 嵌入式 GIS 软件系统 (written in C++/Qt)

2003 RoboCup 机器人足球仿真系统 (built with C++)

研究项目

2009-12 “基于视听觉感知与认知的脑机交互方法与关键技术研究” (国家自然科学基金重点项目, 编号90820304. 负责”脑机运动协调控制”子课题的研究)

2006-08 “脑计算机接口实现中的关键技术研究” (国家自然科学基金面上项目, 编号60575044. 负责信号处理和模式识别算法部分的研究)

2006-08 “运动协调控制的脑机制——基于多态测量融合技术的一体化人机系统研究” (国防科大校预研项目, 研究骨干)

2004-06 “新型脑机接口技术研究” (国防科大校预研项目, 研究骨干)

论文与著作

2014 Zongtan Zhou, Erwei Yin, Yang Liu, Jun Jiang, Dewen Hu, “A novel task-oriented optimal design for P300-based brain–computer interfaces”, Journal of Neural Engineering, 11:056003, 2014. DOI

2011 Liu Yang, Zhou Zongtan, and Hu Dewen, “Gaze independent brain-computer speller with covert visual search tasks,” Clinical Neurophysiology. 122(6):1127-36, 2011. DOI

2010 Liu Yang, “事件相关电位脑-机接口的最优设计 (Optimized design of event-related-potentials based brain-computer interfaces)”, doctoral thesis, 2010.

Liu Yang, Zhou Zongtan, and Hu Dewen, “Comparison of stimulus types in visual P300 speller of brain-computer interfaces,” Proceedings of the 9th IEEE International Conference on Cognitive Informatics (ICCI’10). 273-279, 2010.

2008 Liu Yang, Zhou Zongtan, and Hu Dewen, “Large scale kernel CSP algorithm for EEG feature extraction,” Proceedings of the 4th International Brain-Computer Interface Workshop and Training Course, 2008.

葛瑜，刘杨，周宗潭，胡德文. 用于脑-机接口P300实验的支持向量机分类方法. 计算机工程与设计. 29(11):2859-2862, 2008.

2007 李波, 刘杨, 周宗潭. 嵌入式脑机接口系统的软件设计与实现. 计算机仿真. 24(7):292-295, 2007.

2006 Zhou Zongtan, Liu Yang, and Hu Dewen, “Classification of movement-related potentials for brain-computer interface: a reinforcement training approach,” LNCS. 3973:620-628, 2006.

Zhou Zongtan, Liu Yang, and Hu Dewen, “Extracting the runtime features in EEG signals for the application of brain computer interface,” 自然科学进展, 17(增刊):215, 2006.

Liu Qingbao, Zhou Zongtan, Liu Yang, and Hu Dewen, “Feature extraction and pattern classification on mining electroencephalography data for brain-computer interface,” LNCIS. 345:864-869, 2006.

2005 Liu Yang, Zhou Zongtan, Hu Dewen, and Dong Guohua, “T-weighted approach for neural information processing in p300 based brain-computer interface,” Proceedings of 2005 International Conference on Neural Networks and Brain Proceedings (ICNNB’05). 3:1535-39, 2005.

2001 翻译并校对《独立成分分析》第二部分”独立成分分析基本模型”，并参与全书校对工作。(周宗潭，董国华，徐昕，胡德文译，电子工业出版社, 2007. 原著: A. Hyvärinen, J. Karhunen, and E. Oja, “Independent component analysis,” Wiley, 2001.)
